replies.body: Riot in all it's nerfing glory!
i think we need to give this guy a medal
Play the bottom popularity folks and if there's anything you would ever get, would be buffs.

Talon was at bottom popularity and got nerfed when all other assassins were nerfed. Wukong was never that popular and still got a nerf on his q. Viktor has ridiculously low play rate yet was still balanced by riot. Just because a champ is bottom popularity doesn't mean they will get buffed.
And hes immobile, with relatively low range and damage compared to xerath.
The joys of being a {{champion:133}} main.

This is a funny post, it's called balancing not nerfing. Just because you do well with a champion doesn't mean they wont "nerf" it, they need to balance champions so that the game is actually fun and not use dying in 1 second. 

Who was it that they "nerfed"
